title: Party Animal
description: Alcohol, wild nights, and instant regret. The ultimate drinking game deck.

cards.content: Never have I ever thrown up in an Uber.
Never have I ever texted an ex while drunk.
Never have I ever been kicked out of a bar.
Never have I ever woken up and not known where I was.
Never have I ever danced on a table.
Never have I ever stolen a glass from a bar.
Never have I ever used a fake ID.
Never have I ever done karaoke and regretted it.
Never have I ever kissed a stranger.
Never have I ever blacked out from drinking.
Never have I ever bought a round of drinks I couldn't afford.
Never have I ever dined and dashed.
Never have I ever hooked up with someone whose name I forgot.
Never have I ever peed in public.
Never have I ever skinny dipped.
Never have I ever been in a bar fight.
Never have I ever slept in my clothes/shoes.
Never have I ever lost my phone on a night out.
Never have I ever tried to flirt with a bartender for free drinks.
Never have I ever sent a drunk voice note.
Never have I ever fallen asleep in the bathroom.
Never have I ever tried to walk home when I should have taken a cab.
Never have I ever hooked up with a friend's ex.
Never have I ever cried in the club.
Never have I ever given a fake number to someone.
Never have I ever thrown a drink in someone's face.
Never have I ever crashed a wedding or party.
Never have I ever been banned from an establishment.
Never have I ever taken a body shot.
Never have I ever lied to the police.
Never have I ever snuck alcohol into an event.
Never have I ever hooked up in a car.
Never have I ever made out with more than one person in a night.
Never have I ever woken up with a mystery bruise.
Never have I ever drunk dialed my parents.
Never have I ever gone to work/school hungover.
Never have I ever played beer pong.
Never have I ever flashed someone.
Never have I ever pretended to be sober when I wasn't.
Never have I ever stolen a street sign.
Never have I ever engaged in public display of affection (PDA).
Never have I ever sworn I would never drink again.
Never have I ever mixed more than 3 types of alcohol in one night.
Never have I ever slept on the floor.
Never have I ever accepted a drink from a stranger.
Never have I ever participated in a chugging contest.
Never have I ever been arrested.
Never have I ever lost my wallet/ID.
Never have I ever eaten a kebab at 3 AM.
Never have I ever posted a story I regretted the next morning.
Never have I ever hooked up with a coworker.
Never have I ever gotten a tattoo while drunk.
Never have I ever tried to DJ at a party.
Never have I ever fallen down stairs at a party.
Never have I ever blamed being drunk for something I did.
Never have I ever held someone's hair back while they threw up.
Never have I ever shotgunned a beer.
Never have I ever been to a strip club.
Never have I ever bought a drink for someone I wasn't interested in.
Never have I ever passed out at a party.
